About.abt: Do you want to make a real estate investment? Find out from the e-Mobiliare team what the opportunities are in this market segment, but also how you determine your financing sources, how you calculate the yield of a property, how you make sure that the investment will be profitable and what are the best negotiation methods to make sure you have a good long-term business.
About.s-abt: Our real estate rental / sales platform offers you increased security, accessibility and very low prices. We make sure that your experience is a pleasant one in our application
